description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Dreams of Witchtown is a 2D side scrolling action RPG. Players join elderly witch Aurora, as she embarks on a quest to save her world from the sinister forces trying to destroy it.  Defeat your enemies, increase your level, and save your progress; all with one foot in the grave!
description.short: Dreams of Witchtown is a 2D side scrolling action RPG. Players join elderly witch Aurora, as she embarks on a quest to save her world from the sinister forces trying to destroy it.  Defeat your enemies, increase your level, and save your progress; all with one foot in the grave!
